CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Chart Industries Inc is an independent global manufacturer of engineered equipment used in the production, storage, and end-use of hydrocarbon and industrial gases. The company's operating segments consist of Cryo Tank Solutions, Heat Transfer Systems, Specialty Products and Repair Service & Leasing. It derives the majority of the revenue from Cryo Tank Solutions which has principal operations in the United States, Europe and Asia and primarily serves the geographic regions of the Americas, Europe, Middle East and Asia, supplies bulk, micro bulk and mobile equipment used in the storage, distribution, vaporization, and application of industrial gases.
